name: White T-Shirt
description:
There is a real lack of good-quality, affordable white T-shirts available, pretty much worldwide. M&S did a good one under the name “Seamless,” which, of course, is now discontinued. The rest are cheap shit.

name: Orange Dealer
description: App that shows you all places that sell freshly squeezed orange juice. Not horrible bottled stuff. User submitted spots, ratings, prices etc

name: Automated SBAR Generator
description: ingested data, anything really. Spits out a formatted SBAR. Also had ability to strip PII before ingestion into AI model.

name: YourAIVoiceJournal
description: Biggest miss - didn't market it at all, should have, was good enough to make cash. Web app that allows user to have a conversation with AI, document the conversation, create action item etc that would emailed to X email. Use-case really came down to, i have shit to do at work this morning, how can i take 15 minutes of my drive and save a few hours at work via discussing priorities/ideas/action plan etc with AI. The back and forth of the conversation was actually solid for early 2025. Will do more detailed post on backend etc.

name: MSSPJobs
description: Same as SOCobs, but wider market with just MSSP jobs. Reckon there is still a good market there, however it is a boring idea.

name: SOCJobs
description: one of first small side projects, job board for SOC jobs in UK. Meh.
